# grpc-devtools Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-12-09

## Active Technologies

- TypeScript (project already uses TS), Node.js toolchain for dev scripts; React 19.x (target) + `@babel/core`, `babel-loader`, `@babel/preset-env`, `@babel/preset-react` (automatic runtime), `@babel/preset-typescript`, `babel-plugin-react-compiler`, `babel-jest`, `webpack` (existing), `jest`, `cypress`. (001-react-compiler-migration)


## Commands

npm test && npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript (project already uses TS), Node.js toolchain for dev scripts; React 19.x (target): Follow standard conventions
